summary: The Trailer Park Boys trick Ricky into going to Minneapolis by telling him it's in the North Pole. Once in Minneapolis the present a live Christmas themed show.
cast: John Paul Tremblay|Robb Wells|Mike Smith|John Dunsworth|Patrick Roach|Jacob Rolfe|Doug Barron|Paul Doucette|Marguerite McNeil|Gareth Meagher
director: Directors: Mike Smith, John Paul Tremblay | 2 more credits Â»
title: Trailer Park Boys: Live at the North Pole
